alert.note: Alert for Toole (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 7:25PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Toole County through 815 PM MDT... At 725 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shelby, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shelby. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 359 and 372. Highway 2 between mile markers 274 and 283. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
